# Exercise 27

## Link
https://gralhix.com/ 

## Summary of problem

![challenge photo](https://gralhix.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/05/osintexercise027.png?w=736)

from this photo,
a) Name the speaker.
b) Identify what he was wearing on his lapel.
c) Find footage of his speech.


## Relevant Information
- Lectura in moviemiento en Lima
- OEI
- big golden seal/art


## Observations/Deductions
- Presumably Lima Peru
- Probably a Peru flag behind the speaker?

## Process

#### Let's get started
Google lens finds us [the book published for the conference](https://oei.--044f9e2a3523e075243d1448db82905bee18c3e9/Colecci%C3%B3n%20Lectura%20en%20Movimiento%20-%20En%20Lima.pdf?content_type=application%2Fpdf&disposition=inline%3B+filename%3D%22Coleccion+Lectura+en+Movimiento+-+En+Lima.pdf%22%3B+filename%2A%3DUTF-8%27%27Colecci%25C3%25B3n%2520Lectura%2520en%2520Movimiento%2520-%2520En%2520Lima.pdf). The program confirms our suspicions about the flag!
![peru flag](https://i.imgur.com/aA7JJiK.png)

Throwing the title of the conference back into Google, we can find a [livestream recording on Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WVU-ei4Dunk). Scrolling through the speakers and comparing their outfits, we can very quickly find our speaker: Juan Carlos Ruiz Rodríguez, Director of OEI

![Juan Carlos Ruiz Rodríguez, Director of OEI](https://i.imgur.com/oJwO7h9.png)

Checking news articles for "Lectura en Movimiento en Lima", we can find [an article which has a closeup photo of the speaker](https://es-us.vida-estilo.yahoo.com/finance/noticias/per%C3%BA-oei-promocionan-lectura-calles-235209521.html)!

![closeup](https://s.yimg.com/ny/api/res/1.2/BhcU_3Kos3EwsC16C4xWAA--/YXBwaWQ9aGlnaGxhbmRlcjt3PTI0MDA7aD0xMzUwO2NmPXdlYnA-/https://media.zenfs.com/es/efe.es/6aea5301e1cfc8037834a19d58ff585d)

On his label, he is wearing two pins, one says OEI, the organization running the conference, and the other is a ribbon with red and white stripes, perhaps modeled on the flag of Peru.



## Solution


a) Juan Carlos Ruiz Rodríguez
b) Two pins, OEI and a ribbon
c) [Footage of his speech](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WVU-ei4Dunk)

#### Time Estimate
20 mins
